item.title: The Dino Killing Simulator: John's verdict
item.author: John Tarrant,
item.description: Dino Horde is possibly the best FPS I have played, and if not the best, it certainly ranks high on the list. The game rose from the ashes of Dino Beatdown and has carried the reviews forward on Metacritic, but since its rebirth as Dino Horde it is unrecognisable. I considered getting Beatdown when â€¦
